snippet: A reader writes, “We need real women in decision-making positions in the United Nations to empower women, not female cartoon characters.”...
lead_paragraph: A reader writes, “We need real women in decision-making positions in the United Nations to empower women, not female cartoon characters.”

headline.print_headline: Insult to Women at the U.N.
headline.main: An Insult to Women at the U.N.
